entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Barrhead
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Barrhead 07:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: -19.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: -21.9°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Fog dissipating. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog becoming fog patches this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
